summary: TXT file for Bat console command
descriptionHtml:
why this file is needed?
\"skill.TXT\" file for \"Bat\" console command. command \"Bat\" executes the commands recorded in a txt file. not need to enter them manually.
if You use console command \"showracemenu\"  and lose yours head
needed for change race for \"Custom race\" if you want to keep your face
Custom race http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8720#

(Credit for changing race fix goes to lunar_silence, see link for detailed instructions 
http://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=2277608
author: Rost3
